snippet: The man behind scents named for fashion designers like Ralph Lauren, Paloma Picasso and Gloria Vanderbilt.
abstract: George Friedman, former advertising executive who helped develop and market perfumes named for several top fashion designers, dies at age 77.
lead_paragraph: The man behind scents named for fashion designers like Ralph Lauren, Paloma Picasso and Gloria Vanderbilt.

headline.seo: George Friedman, Developer of Designer Perfumes, Dies at 77
headline.main: George Friedman, Developer of Designer Perfumes, Dies at 77
headline.print_headline: George Friedman, 77, Developer Of Scents for Fashion Designers
